title: Dasht-e-Kavir
content: The vastness of the Dasht-e Kavir or lran’s Central Kavir spreads across the provinces of Tehran, Semnan, Qom, Yazd, Khorasan é Razavi, and Esfahan. In this area, the various desert and kavir phenomena can be found. Multiple types of Aeolian dunes, mudflats, and diverse Kavir textures are seen throughout the plain. Two of lran’s significant protected zones, the National Park of Kavir and Khartooran, are located in the Dasht-e Kavir. The endangered species of Asian cheetah and zebra live in such areas.
